job.title: Software Engineer - Machine Learning
job.description: pstrongTHIS IS BLUE APRONstrongppbrppChefs around the world wear blue aprons when learning to cook and for us it has become a symbol of lifelong learningnbspOur highly motivated group of food enthusiasts are inspired to work on complex business problems with creativity and passion always looking to learn something new We take preparation seriously embrace a spirit of excellence and put in the extra effort in everything we donbspWe are thrilled to be part of our customers lives cooking and creating experiences in their home kitchensppbrppstrongWHOS IN THE KITCHENnbspstrongppbrppOur Technology team is a collection of over 50 talented engineers analysts designers and product managers who have built our web and ecommerce applications our mobile iOS and Android apps our proprietary Warehouse Management System and our data platform among many other things Within Engineering the Data team is responsible for our enterprise data warehouse business intelligence platform ETL processes and data pipelines as well as machine learning models and deployment infrastructure including demand forecasting warehouse optimization personalization and product recommendationsppbrppData Engineering at Blue Apron strives for deeper visibility across the entire data lifecycle with a Data Operationscentered culture In an era where data and metrics are a prerequisite for strategic and tactical decisionmaking this is vital in Blue Aprons competitive edge in the mealkit marketppbrppstrongWHATS ON THE MENUnbspstrongppbrpulliSolve highimpact problems contributing to the success of our chefs at home and of the organization as a wholeliliResearch design and implement new predictive models to assess recipe appeal solve complex logistical challenges and help customers get more out of their Blue Apron experienceliliCollaborate with other engineers and internal stakeholders to apply ML solutions to the unique challenges of our businessliliResearch share and recommend new technologies and trendsliliOur stack Python Airflow orchestration BigQuery warehousing Looker BI Kafka streaming Spark MLliulpbrppstrongNECESSARY INGREDIENTSnbspstrongppbrpulli2 years experience in data science andor machine learningliliSolid understanding of statistical methods and machine learning techniquesliliWillingness to own ML models from endtoend from requirements and data collection to production deployment and performance evaluationliliStrong communication skills and experience working with technical and nontechnical stakeholders to solve problems the ability to explain highly technical concepts to a nontechnical audienceliulpbrppstrongNICE TO HAVEstrongppbrpulliPython skillsliliExperience in writing and debugging SQL queriesliliExperience with Airflow Luigi or similar data orchestration platformsliliActive member of the open source or local tech communityliulpbrppstrongAT BLUE APRON DATA ENGINEERING WE VALUEstrongppbrpulliEagerness to learn crossfunctionally not only within the Data Engineering domain but also within various business functions like Operations Supply Chain Accounting Consumer Product Marketing Retail Finance and DevOpsliliAn openness to both giving and receiving constructive feedback with the intention of bettering everyone involvedliliA thirst for learning and a passion for putting new technologies processes and patterns into practice in a realistic mannerliliAn ability to understand how the whole system fits together at both a high level as well as at a detailed level in the given area of responsibility and beyondliulpbrppemBlue Apron provides equal employment opportunities EEO to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin age disability genetics marital status or veteran status In addition to federal law requirements Blue Apron complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment including recruiting hiring placement promotion termination layoff recall transfer leaves of absence compensation and trainingemp
